text:
@realDonaldTrump @POTUS @PressSec @WhiteHouse Donald Trump has been using the #Covid19 #pandemic as an opportunity to DESTROY the #USPS.

Now he's using it to try to DESTROY #SocialSecurity & Medicare. If he gets his way on a payroll tax cut, which by the way DOES NOT help the unemployed...
